data.name: MagiCarnage
data.detailed_description:
Once every 1000 years, the gods materialize themselves into the mortal plane and battle one another in order to see who's truly the god of gods.

MagiCarnage is a top down arena fighting shooter game, inspired by many other indie games of similar genres; you will play as the magical gods known as the "Magi" and engage magical battles with others utilizing a large selection of unique and powerful spells.

- Full Online Multiplayer
- Local Multiplayer
- Controller Support
- Tons of different unique spells
- Plenty of skins to choose from

data.short_description: Once every 1000 years, the gods materialize themselves into the mortal plane and battle one another in order to see who's truly the god of gods. Cast powerful spells and shatter your opponents, in MagiCarnage!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
